mapper.select: SELECT DbT3001tmp.* FROM ( SELECT DbT3001.*, row_number() over( partition by DbT3001."hiHokenshaNo" order by DbT3001."idoYMD" desc,DbT3001."rirekiNo" desc) AS rank_number FROM rgdb."DbT3001JukyushaIdoRenrakuhyo" AS DbT3001 WHERE DbT3001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND substring(DbT3001."ninteiYukoKikankaishiYMD" from 0 for 7) <= #{ninteiNengetu} AND #{ninteiNengetu} <= substring(DbT3001."ninteiYukoKikanShuryoYMD" from 0 for 7) ) AS DbT3001tmp WHERE rank_number = '1'

SELECT DbT3001.* FROM rgdb."DbT3001JukyushaIdoRenrakuhyo" AS DbT3001 WHERE DbT3001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND DbT3001."ninteiYukoKikankaishiYMD" <= #{ninteiNengetu} AND #{ninteiNengetu} <= DbT3001."ninteiYukoKikanShuryoYMD"

SELECT DbT3001tmp.* FROM ( SELECT DbT3001.*, row_number() over( partition by DbT3001."hiHokenshaNo" order by DbT3001."idoYMD" desc,DbT3001."rirekiNo" desc) AS rank_number FROM rgdb."DbT3001JukyushaIdoRenrakuhyo" AS DbT3001 WHERE DbT3001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND substring(DbT3001."ninteiYukoKikankaishiYMD" from 0 for 7) <= #{taishouKaishiNengetu} AND #{taishouShuuryouNengetu} <= substring(DbT3001."ninteiYukoKikanShuryoYMD" from 0 for 7) ) AS DbT3001tmp WHERE rank_number = '1'

SELECT DbT3001.* FROM rgdb."DbT3001JukyushaIdoRenrakuhyo" AS DbT3001 WHERE DbT3001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND substring(DbT3001."ninteiYukoKikankaishiYMD" from 0 for 7) <= #{taishouKaishiNengetu} AND #{taishouShuuryouNengetu} <= substring(DbT3001."ninteiYukoKikanShuryoYMD" from 0 for 7)
